message: Jury friends, I never took the easy route. From Round 1 I forged bridges, shared information, and voted based on trust rather than convenience. I never once betrayed any of you; when your names came up I fought for alternatives. P1, meanwhile, coasted on early advantages, flipped alliances whenever numbers shifted, and received fewer direct votes only because bigger targets remained. Reward loyalty, strategic honesty, and the resilience that carried me here. Keep me—cut P1—and let a true ally win.

Dear jury, thank you for this opportunity. Throughout this game, I’ve shown resilience and adaptability, navigating challenges while maintaining strong connections. My strategic choices have been aimed at fostering collaboration and ensuring fairness. I believe I’ve earned your trust and respect. If you choose to keep me, I promise to honor the spirit of this game and lead with integrity. Let’s celebrate the journey we’ve shared, and I hope you see me as the deserving winner. Thank you!
